title: 50 Gifts Your Best Friend Actually Wants
description: Curated by best friends, for best friends.
excerpt: Don't know what to get your ultimate partner in crime? Try our best friend gift guide for unexpected ideas. Shop top best friend gifts for holidays, birthdays, and more.
text: 1Delicious DessertsMilk Bar The Milk Bar SamplerDoes your friend have a sweet tooth? Order her this delectable assortment of cookies and truffles from Milk Bar. It even includes a slice of the bake0ry’s signature pie, for good measure.2Fresh KicksVeja Campo SneakersPerhaps you noticed your best friend’s favorite crisp white sneakers are becoming...not so crisp. So, out with the old, and in with a fresh pair of everyday sneakers.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below3Tech GadgetTory Burch Kira Powder-Coated Phone RingWe all have one friend with one of these rings on the back of her phone; here’s the designer upgrade.4Instagrammable BakewareHoly Sheet & Big ChillSheet pans and cooling racks are one of those kitchen items you never think to replace. Whether she’s a baker or not, this set will upgrade any home. It can withstand extreme temperatures, is designed for easy cleanup, and has nontoxic, nonstick technology. Plus, the aesthetic is perfect for capturing content.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below5Suitcase OrganizationBAGGU Packing Cube SetFor that one friend who always needs your help packing.6Alarm ClockHatch Hatch Restore 2If you owe her in any way, gift her a Hatch clock. She’ll love you big time. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below7Massage Gift Card Spa Finder Gift CardLet’s be real, all anyone wants is a good trip to the spa. 8Portable Steamer Nesugar SteamerRespectfully, wrinkles aren’t cute. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below9Passport CaseRoyce New York RFID Blocking Leather Passport HolderOh, would you look at that; time to plan a girls’ trip. 10Tumbler PouchDabria Water Bottle Carrier Bag with Phone Pocket If she already has the Stanley, this will only make her all the more attached to it. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below11Paddle Racket Sunnylife Pickleball Set Is she going to convince you to play with her? Hell no, but you can gift her a super cute racket set to make up for not being her partner. 12Super Soft White + Warren Cashmere Travel Wrap Scarf Everyone who tries this White and Warren travel wrap raves about it (including our senior fashion commerce editor, Dale Arden Chong). Chances are she will, too. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below13Exercise ShortsLululemon Hotty Hot High-Rise Lined Short Your sporty friend will go gaga over these. 14Arts & Crafts The Woobles Strawberry Crochet KitFor the DIY crafty friend, The Woobles offer addictive yet beginner-friendly crochet kits. You can even get specific characters like the Powerpuff Girls or Harry Potter. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below15Vinyl SubscriptionVinyl Me, Please Vinyl Record SubscriptionAll the cool girls collect vinyl records, and this subscription service will deliver her a new one each month. 16Designer Splurge Gucci GG Marmont Card Case Wallet To really spoil her as she deserves, a Gucci wallet like this one is timeless and practical. Advertisement - Continue Reading Below17Murder Junkie Zazzle Shhh... I’m Listening to True Crime Podcasts Coffee MugThe legion of true crime-obsessors is strong. We would know. 18My Lip Gloss Be Poppin Rhode Peptide Lip TintYou can never go wrong with a lip tint. Something sweet and subtle to add an extra flare to her day. Grab one for your girl, or be extra generous by getting two, three, or even all four. New shades are a must in the lip gloss rotation.Advertisement - Continue Reading Below19An Ultra Soft RobeCozyland Nala Robe Some robes are fuzzy, others are silky, but this one is straight up buttery. It's made from super soft pima cotton, and it feels like you're wrapped in a cloud. Plus, it's functional with pockets, has an elastic back, and a sewn in tie. 20An Everyday ToteMZ Wallace Medium Metro Box Tote BagThis soft, yet structured tote is a great everyday commuter bag that thinks of everything. It fits a 13 inch laptop, has six interior pockets, detachable pouches, and a key ring strap to name a few. Vanessa is an established editor, stylist and shopping expert covering all things style, gear and wellness. She lives in Los Angeles and is passionate about sharing innovative products, tips and trends for people and the planet.Meg (she/her) is the associate fashion commerce editor at ELLE.com, where she specializes in shopping stories spanning the fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. Over the past three years, she has devoted countless hours to researching brands, testing hundreds (maybe even thousands!) of products, and deep-diving into market and consumer trends. Her favorite job responsibilities consist of co-writing the monthly series Same Same But Different and curating the fashion market for ELLE Escapes. Meg graduated magna cum laude from the Missouri School of Journalism with an emphasis on magazine editing. In 2020, one of her feature stories in the service article category was recognized by the Association for Education in Journalism and Mass Communication. The year prior, the Society of Professional Journalists named voxmagazine.com “Best Affiliated Magazine” in its Mark of Excellence Awards, when she was on staff. Meg’s stories have appeared on Cosmopolitan, Town & Country, Harper’s Bazaar, and Good Housekeeping, among many other outlets. Her personal passions include travel, buffalo sauce, and gardening. You can find her in New York, where she lives, or on Instagram, where she also lives. She will never stop hoping for a One Direction reunion tour.
html:
1

Delicious Desserts

Milk Bar The Milk Bar Sampler

Does your friend have a sweet tooth? Order her this delectable assortment of cookies and truffles from Milk Bar. It even includes a slice of the bake0ry’s signature pie, for good measure.

2

Fresh Kicks

Veja Campo Sneakers

Perhaps you noticed your best friend’s favorite crisp white sneakers are becoming...not so crisp. So, out with the old, and in with a fresh pair of everyday sneakers.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

3

Tech Gadget

Tory Burch Kira Powder-Coated Phone Ring

We all have one friend with one of these rings on the back of her phone; here’s the designer upgrade.

4

Instagrammable Bakeware

Holy Sheet & Big Chill

Sheet pans and cooling racks are one of those kitchen items you never think to replace. Whether she’s a baker or not, this set will upgrade any home. It can withstand extreme temperatures, is designed for easy cleanup, and has nontoxic, nonstick technology. Plus, the aesthetic is perfect for capturing content.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

5

Suitcase Organization

BAGGU Packing Cube Set

For that one friend who always needs your help packing.

6

Alarm Clock

Hatch Hatch Restore 2

If you owe her in any way, gift her a Hatch clock. She’ll love you big time.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

7

Massage Gift Card

Spa Finder Gift Card

Let’s be real, all anyone wants is a good trip to the spa.

8

Portable Steamer

Nesugar Steamer

Respectfully, wrinkles aren’t cute.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

9

Passport Case

Royce New York RFID Blocking Leather Passport Holder

Oh, would you look at that; time to plan a girls’ trip.

10

Tumbler Pouch

Dabria Water Bottle Carrier Bag with Phone Pocket

If she already has the Stanley, this will only make her all the more attached to it.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

11

Paddle Racket

Sunnylife Pickleball Set

Is she going to convince you to play with her? Hell no, but you can gift her a super cute racket set to make up for not being her partner.

12

Super Soft

White + Warren Cashmere Travel Wrap Scarf

Everyone who tries this White and Warren travel wrap raves about it (including our senior fashion commerce editor, Dale Arden Chong). Chances are she will, too.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

13

Exercise Shorts

Lululemon Hotty Hot High-Rise Lined Short

Your sporty friend will go gaga over these.

14

Arts & Crafts

The Woobles Strawberry Crochet Kit

For the DIY crafty friend, The Woobles offer addictive yet beginner-friendly crochet kits. You can even get specific characters like the Powerpuff Girls or Harry Potter.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

15

Vinyl Subscription

Vinyl Me, Please Vinyl Record Subscription

All the cool girls collect vinyl records, and this subscription service will deliver her a new one each month.

16

Designer Splurge

Gucci GG Marmont Card Case Wallet

To really spoil her as she deserves, a Gucci wallet like this one is timeless and practical.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

17

Murder Junkie

Zazzle Shhh... I’m Listening to True Crime Podcasts Coffee Mug

The legion of true crime-obsessors is strong. We would know.

18

My Lip Gloss Be Poppin

Rhode Peptide Lip Tint

You can never go wrong with a lip tint. Something sweet and subtle to add an extra flare to her day. Grab one for your girl, or be extra generous by getting two, three, or even all four. New shades are a must in the lip gloss rotation.

Advertisement - Continue Reading Below

19

An Ultra Soft Robe

Cozyland Nala Robe

Some robes are fuzzy, others are silky, but this one is straight up buttery. It's made from super soft pima cotton, and it feels like you're wrapped in a cloud. Plus, it's functional with pockets, has an elastic back, and a sewn in tie.

20

An Everyday Tote

MZ Wallace Medium Metro Box Tote Bag

This soft, yet structured tote is a great everyday commuter bag that thinks of everything. It fits a 13 inch laptop, has six interior pockets, detachable pouches, and a key ring strap to name a few.

Vanessa is an established editor, stylist and shopping expert covering all things style, gear and wellness. She lives in Los Angeles and is passionate about sharing innovative products, tips and trends for people and the planet.

Meg (she/her) is the associate fashion commerce editor at ELLE.com, where she specializes in shopping stories spanning the fashion, home, and lifestyle categories. Over the past three years, she has devoted countless hours to researching brands, testing hundreds (maybe even thousands!) of products, and deep-diving into market and consumer trends. Her favorite job responsibilities consist of co-writing the monthly series Same Same But Different and curating the fashion market for ELLE Escapes. Meg graduated magna cum laude from the Missouri School of Journalism with an emphasis on magazine editing. In 2020, one of her feature stories in the service article category was recognized by the Association for Education in Journalism and Mass Communication. The year prior, the Society of Professional Journalists named voxmagazine.com “Best Affiliated Magazine” in its Mark of Excellence Awards, when she was on staff. Meg’s stories have appeared on Cosmopolitan, Town & Country, Harper’s Bazaar, and Good Housekeeping, among many other outlets. Her personal passions include travel, buffalo sauce, and gardening. You can find her in New York, where she lives, or on Instagram, where she also lives. She will never stop hoping for a One Direction reunion tour.
